Posts.EditableText: Is there a way to have the words show up on screen as if a message is being typed instead of just showing up in a big block of text?
Posts.HTML: Is there a way to have the words show up on screen as if a message is being typed instead of just showing up in a big block of text?

Posts.EditableText:
In Text Adventure, the "big brother" of this, there is a typewriter command...
You can even set the typing speed.
Posts.HTML:
